title: Windows 11 KB5035942 update enables Moment 5 features for everyone
description: Microsoft has released the March 2024 non-security KB5035942 preview update for Windows 11 23H2, which enables Moment 5 features by default and fixes 18 known issues. [...]

title: Windows 10 KB5035941 update released with lock screen widgets
description: Microsoft has released the optional KB5035941 preview cumulative update for Windows 10 22H2, introducing widgets on the lock screen, Windows Spotlight on the desktop, and 21 other fixes or changes. [...]

title: Finland confirms APT31 hackers behind 2021 parliament breach
description: The Finnish Police confirmed on Tuesday that the APT31 hacking group linked to the Chinese Ministry of State Security (MSS) was behind a breach of the country's parliament disclosed in March 2021. [...]

title: $700 cybercrime software turns Raspberry Pi into an evasive fraud tool
description: Cybercriminals are selling custom Raspberry Pi software called 'GEOBOX' on Telegram, which allows inexperienced hackers to convert the mini-computers into anonymous cyberattack tools. [...]

title: Germany warns of 17K vulnerable Microsoft Exchange servers exposed online
description: The German national cybersecurity authority warned on Tuesday that it found at least 17,000 Microsoft Exchange servers in Germany exposed online and vulnerable to one or more critical security vulnerabilities. [...]

title: Hackers exploit Ray framework flaw to breach servers, hijack resources
description: A new hacking campaign dubbed "ShadowRay" targets an unpatched vulnerability in Ray, a popular open-source AI framework, to hijack computing power and leak sensitive data from thousands of companies. [...]

title: Free VPN apps on Google Play turned Android phones into proxies
description: Over 15 free VPN apps on Google Play were found using a malicious software development kit that turned Android devices into unwitting residential proxies, likely used for cybercrime and shopping bots. [...]

title: TheMoon malware infects 6,000 ASUS routers in 72 hours for proxy service
description: A new variant of "TheMoon" malware botnet has been spotted infecting thousands of outdated small office and home office (SOHO) routers and IoT devices in 88 countries. [...]
